explanation: [0-0] A man in armor and a red cape stands opposite a man in a red shirt. Behind him, two people turn their heads to look at them. In the distance are rolling mountains. The word "Respect" is written in white at the top of the screen, along with two cold expressions. The watermark "CFS YT" is written in white at the bottom of the screen.

[0-4] The man in armor throws the hammer in his hand forward. The hammer flies past the man in front of him and flies to the left. The man turns to look in the direction the hammer is flying. Then you can see the man in the red shirt and some of the onlookers behind him in the picture. Then the hammer flies into the distance and back into the man's hand. The man opposite also pretends to turn and look at the owner of the hammer.
